info.name: Job Portal Backend API
info.description: A web-based platform connecting job seekers with employers. The system allows job seekers to register and manage their profiles, while employers can browse anonymized profiles and request candidates. Admins manage the platform, job seekers, and employer interactions. The platform supports English and Kinyarwanda.

formdata.value: Experienced full-stack developer with 7 years of experience in modern web technologies.
JavaScript, React, Node.js, Python, Django, PostgreSQL, AWS, Docker, Git
Available upon request. Previous employers: TechCorp Rwanda, Digital Solutions Ltd.

request.description: Register a new job seeker with optional photo upload. Use multipart/form-data. Required: email, password, firstName, lastName. Optional: photo, description, skills, gender, dateOfBirth, idNumber, contactNumber, maritalStatus, location, city, country, references, experience, jobCategoryId. Returns user info with profile (no password). A welcome email will be sent to the registered email address. Photo must be an image file under 5MB.

response.name: Success with Photo
response.body:
{
  "id": 2,
  "email": "sarah.johnson@example.com",
  "role": "jobseeker",
  "profile": {
    "id": 2,
    "userId": 2,
    "firstName": "Sarah",
    "lastName": "Johnson",
    "description": "Experienced full-stack developer with 7 years of experience in modern web technologies.",
    "skills": "JavaScript, React, Node.js, Python, Django, PostgreSQL, AWS, Docker, Git",

request.description: Admin creates a job seeker (worker) account. Only email, firstName, and lastName are required. Default password is 'Brazi Connect Portal@123'.

body.raw:
{
  "subject": "Re: General Inquiry",
  "message": "Dear John Smith,

Thank you for contacting Job Portal. We appreciate your interest in our services.

Here's how our platform works:

1. **For Employers:**
   - Register an account or submit a request
   - Describe your job requirements
   - We'll match you with suitable candidates

2. **For Job Seekers:**
   - Create a profile with your skills and experience
   - Browse available opportunities
   - Apply directly through our platform

Please let us know if you need any clarification or have additional questions.

Best regards,
Job Portal Team"
}

Please let us know if you need any clarification or have additional questions.
